category.name: PSM
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_ENABLE_REPOSITION_DIALOG
preference.preference_description: Indicates the visibility in graphics menu of the dialog for the "Reposition" command. Valid Values: * true: Only the "Reposition" dialog is visible in graphics menu. * false: Only the "Transformation" dialog is visible in graphics menu. This is the default value. This is a site preference.
